name: Sunday Blues (demo reel)
description:
Use the right > arrow key on keyboard to keep projection running..

Occasionally use the up arrow key to switch scene when Cue mark appears.

You must keep the projector/action film running! Watch out for falling cinderblock!!!

Change the reel when the cue mark appears ("cig burn"/circle stage left). Try to get through the film to the "Fini" or things get a little lopsided. Cinematic epic masterpiece!!

I was going for a 1920s silent film style taking place in a playground... Enjoy.
